data.text: Tadau goolo madamada gu bilau,
Nia dama daane o Zion nogo hagalabagau gadoo be nia goolo,
Nia paana lodo geinga e haga uu nadau dama,
Digaula e dugu hua nadau dama bolo gii mmade i di hiigai mo di hieinu.
Nia daangada nogo gai nadau meegai humalia i mua,
Agu daangada guu kae di hagaduadua koia e huaidu i di hagaduadua digau Sodom,4.6 Genesis 19.24
Tadau gau aamua nogo madammaa ge kene be nia ‘snow’.
Gei dolomeenei digaula e mmoe mmoe i hongo nia ala,
Digau ala ne mmade i lodo tauwa e haadanga lamalia i digau ala ne mmade nomuli,
Di haingadaa dela ne tale ang gi agu daangada
Dimaadua gu taiaga dono hagawelewele,
Gu deai tangada i golo,
Nia mee aanei guu hai mai i ana soukohp mo ana gau hai mee dabu
Nia dagi digaula gu heehee i hongo nia ala
Nia daangada gu wwolowwolo boloo,
Dimaadua gu hagalee hila gi digaula,
Gidaadou gu halahala di hagamaamaa dela digi hanimoi,
Nia hagadaumee nogo talitali gidaadou,
Di hai o tadau hagadaumee la guu hai be di ‘eagle’
Digaula guu kumi di hagamau o tadau mouli,
Goodou go digau Edom mo Uz, goodou gadagada.
Zion guu kae di hui o nadau huaidu.
